solution_line_template: The total number of new followers after a year is {days_in_year}*{new_followers_per_day} = <<{days_in_year}*{new_followers_per_day}={new_followers_year}>>{new_followers_year} followers.
His total number of followers in a year is {initial_followers}+{new_followers_year} = <<{initial_followers}+{new_followers_year}={total_followers_year}>>{total_followers_year} followers.
If {unfollowed} people unfollowed him, the total number of followers remaining is {total_followers_year}-{unfollowed} = {followers_remaining} followers.
